title: RATP - Your daily co-pilot
description:
Enjoy a more streamlined experience with the new, more efficient and easier to use RATP app! Benefit from optimised route lookup with a large choice of transportation, get real-time schedules and alerts if service is disrupted!
It is also a real journey buddy you can use to discover the city in a different way! Find your way around the city better through geolocation and save your favourite places to optimise your journey times.
This new version of the app was redesigned with your help so it provides what you need.
So, where are we going?
What if you bought your tickets from your RATP app?
Thanks to your RATP app, buy your T + tickets and Navigo Week / Navigo Month whenever and wherever you want!
Choose from:
- Buying and charging your travel ticket from your RATP app and validating with your phone. Easy, isn’t it?
- Topping up your Navigo pass directly from your RATP app. Convenient, isn’t it?
You can check the compatibility of your phone in the navigation drawer, under the ‘My tickets’ section.
All roads lead to Rome!
By metro, RER, Bus, Tram or Noctilien, Orlyval, Transilien SNCF and even Vélib’, you are guided step by step in your search: walking time, arrival time and recommended exit.
Don't do things the hard way anymore!
Look up the next departures from your favourite stations to make sure you leave at the right time! A glance at your favourites will tell you how long it will take you to get home, to your workplace or wherever you want to go! Pssst.... here's a good tip for you 😉: wherever you are, use maRATP to find your favourite places either on your smartphone or on the website maRATP and enjoy personalised offers throughout the year! 😉
A forewarned passenger is a forearmed passenger!
Get real-time alerts on the service situation on your favourite lines through notifications! The added extra of this new version: an overview of your lines accessible from the home page. 😉
Don't lose your way!
The map shows you at a glance all means of transport around you. No network? No worries! You can view network maps (RATP and Île-de-France Mobilités) offline.
Your opinion counts!
Tell us what you think about the app as it will be further developed based on your suggestions so it best meets your needs!
See you soon on the bus or in the metro! 😉
description_html:
Enjoy a more streamlined experience with the new, more efficient and easier to use RATP app! Benefit from optimised route lookup with a large choice of transportation, get real-time schedules and alerts if service is disrupted!

It is also a real journey buddy you can use to discover the city in a different way! Find your way around the city better through geolocation and save your favourite places to optimise your journey times.

This new version of the app was redesigned with your help so it provides what you need.

So, where are we going?


What if you bought your tickets from your RATP app?
Thanks to your RATP app, buy your T + tickets and Navigo Week / Navigo Month whenever and wherever you want!

Choose from:
- Buying and charging your travel ticket from your RATP app and validating with your phone. Easy, isn’t it?
- Topping up your Navigo pass directly from your RATP app. Convenient, isn’t it?

You can check the compatibility of your phone in the navigation drawer, under the ‘My tickets’ section.


All roads lead to Rome!
By metro, RER, Bus, Tram or Noctilien, Orlyval, Transilien SNCF and even Vélib’, you are guided step by step in your search: walking time, arrival time and recommended exit.


Don't do things the hard way anymore!
Look up the next departures from your favourite stations to make sure you leave at the right time! A glance at your favourites will tell you how long it will take you to get home, to your workplace or wherever you want to go! Pssst.... here's a good tip for you 😉: wherever you are, use maRATP to find your favourite places either on your smartphone or on the website maRATP and enjoy personalised offers throughout the year! 😉


A forewarned passenger is a forearmed passenger!
Get real-time alerts on the service situation on your favourite lines through notifications! The added extra of this new version: an overview of your lines accessible from the home page. 😉


Don't lose your way!
The map shows you at a glance all means of transport around you. No network? No worries! You can view network maps (RATP and Île-de-France Mobilités) offline.


Your opinion counts!
Tell us what you think about the app as it will be further developed based on your suggestions so it best meets your needs!


See you soon on the bus or in the metro! 😉
